description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1mc34","text":"There exist at least three different pools of cholesterol in the plasma membrane: the essential pool, the sphingomyelin-sequestered pool, and the accessible pool (Radhakrishnan et al, 2020). Ciliary Hedgehog signaling is regulated by the accessible pool of cholesterol  (Kinnebrew et al, 2019), and His-mNeon-FLAG-ALOD4, a toxin-based probe, can be used to visualize this accessible pool. Here, we present a method for staining and measuring the amount of accessible cholesterol on cilia in 3T3 fibroblasts stably expressing Somatostatin Receptor (SSTR3)-mApple, a ciliary marker. The protocol described here is based upon previously established methods (Kinnebrew et al., 2019; Johnson and Radhakrishnan, 2021) and has also been used successfully to label cilia in RPE cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aeis8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6sqsv","text":"Purified ALOD4 is best used fresh and will lose activity if frozen; store at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ps38","text":"Make a   starter culture of BL21 DE3 Rosetta plysS cells expressing pRSET+ His-mNeon-FLAG-ALOD4, starting from a fresh colony picked from freshly transformed plates containing carbenicillin (100μg/ml) and chloramphenicol (34μg/ml). Grow   with shaking in an Erlenmeyer flask at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":237,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":278,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d67fp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7lud2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1irpu","text":"Vortex the bottles to help resuspend pellet; transfer resuspended pellets to the beaker with a stir bar. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3shpc","text":"Take   of this suspension to the Emulsiflex cell breakage device and have ready, 4 x 65ml polycarbonate ultracentrifuge tubes on ice for the homogenate from the next step.  Pass   lysis buffer through the Emulsiflex once at 0-30K PSI to equilibrate the machine.  Pass suspension through the Emulsiflex once at ~50K PSI to lyse cells. Collect directly into polycarbonate tubes  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":178,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":376,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"an9sc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"229v0","text":"Balance tubes and then spin at 40,000 RPM for   in a 45Ti rotor at  to pellet cell debris.  Collect supernatant and filter through a  , 0.45µm Millipore filter. Collect the filtered supernatant in a   glass beaker  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":199,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":214,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ce87j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t986","text":"Take a   HiTrap Talon column (Cytiva #28953766) and wash it with 10 column volumes (CV) of distilled, degassed water.  Equilibrate column with 10CV lysis buffer (50mM HEPES pH 8, 500 mM NaCl, 5mM MgCl2, 0.5mM TCEP, 10% glycerol, EDTA-free protease tablet)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":200,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7rn0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ffnsh","text":"Run the lysate through the column. Collect the flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qtt","text":"Wash the column with 30CV wash buffer (50mM HEPES pH 8, 500 mM NaCl, 5mM MgCl2, 0.5mM TCEP, 10% glycerol, 20mM imidazole). Collect the wash fractions.  Elute with an imidazole gradient of 100mM-500mM. Collect the elution fractions and analyze them by SDS PAGE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":77,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s3sd","text":"Pool the fractions having the desired protein and buffer exchange the pool using a PD-10 desalting column (Cytiva #17085101) into the storage buffer (50mM HEPES pH 8, 150mM NaCl, 5mM MgCl2, 0.5mM TCEP, 10% glycerol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":187,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o3hu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24lah","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aaj7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nk4g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dmil5","text":"ALOD4 will lose significant activity if frozen.  Use fresh or store at 4°C and use within two weeks of purification","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"20o17","text":"Seed 0.3 X 106 cells onto collagen-coated coverslips. Once attached, starve the cells in media without serum or in low serum for   to induce ciliogenesis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":129,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1g5tb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frav5","text":"Set up an incubation chamber for ALOD4-mNeon staining: place a metal tray (covered with a layer of parafilm) on ice for 20-30 minutes before paraformaldehyde (PFA) fixation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45pgu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"hft4","text":"Aspirate media and fix cells in 4% PFA in 1X PBS for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5j8vg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5i0hd","text":"Wash the cells three times in 1X PBS; transfer the coverslips to the incubation chamber and incubate them for   in 4μM ALOD4-mNeon diluted in 1% BSA 1X PBS, sterilized by passage through a 0.2 μm filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f8gid","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hnqq","text":"Wash the cells twice in 1X PBS; fix the cells again in 2% PFA diluted in 1X PBS for 5 minutes  . Wash the cells again twice in 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"nm1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7on08","text":"Optional: stain with DAPI (1:1000) for 4 minutes on ice.  Wash the cells twice in 1X PBS and mount them onto clean glass slides using 4 µl Mowiol. Air-dry the coverslips and proceed to imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tokc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnrht","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43lr2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":369,"id":423067,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"66jsc\",\"text\":\"Shown here is an example of SDS-PAGE analysis of the Hi Trap Talon purification.  Samples were analyzed on 4–20% Precast Protein Gels.  The yield is ~7mg from 4L culture. Depending on the purity of the protein after affinity chromatography, we either purify it further by size exclusion chromatography or more commonly, simply carry out buffer exchange using a PD-10 desalting column. \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2023-11-23 at 11.47.14 AM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7e7bc32f.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7e5bc32f.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7e6bc32f.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7e4bc32f.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n1cp","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fl9cp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":255,"id":423071,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"2kebu\",\"text\":\"Shown here is an example 3T3 cell expressing SSTR3-mApple, starved for 24h to trigger ciliogenesis and stained with purified His-tagged mNeon-FLAG-ALOD4 protein according to this protocol.  \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2023-11-24 at 12.16.10 PM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7fbbc32f.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7e9bc32f.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7fabc32f.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/n7e8bc32f.webp","width":550}}}}
